actions.name: VE - Update Other Open Incident Details
actions.title: VE - Update Other Open Incident Details

properties.display_name: VE - Update Other Open Incident Details

properties.script:
msg = $activity.definition_activity_01U615I5ZKCFN4Kwo4KRs2F6gXfM2A2RWI4.output.variable_workflow_01T8J5AW9TZ8B3smDvtFSz2OUPWibgZcQvh$ 
#EM7_VALUES['%M']
recorded_device_name = $activity.definition_activity_01U615I5ZKCFN4Kwo4KRs2F6gXfM2A2RWI4.output.variable_workflow_01T8J3FDV8G4K7hiRvLwfY8kcRCvvkMa6XR$ 
#EM7_VALUES.get('%Y', '')
recorded_device_callid = ""

if recorded_device_name:
    recorded_device_name = recorded_device_name
else:
    device_name_pattern = r"(RecordedDeviceName|Recorded Device Name)\s?=(\w+)"
    device_name_match = re.search(device_name_pattern, msg)
    if device_name_match:
        recorded_device_name = device_name_match.group(2)

device_callid_pattern = r"(RecordedDeviceCallID|Recorded Device Call ID)\s?=(\w+)"
device_callid_match = re.search(device_callid_pattern, msg)

if device_callid_match:
    recorded_device_callid = device_callid_match.group(2)
